oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Burn. Febb Burn (Mrs. James L. Burn)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Febb Ensminger Burn (Mrs. James L. Burn) of Niota, TN, standing outdoors. She wrote the August 1920 letter to her son Harry urging him to vote for women's suffrage.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Febb Burn, portraits
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
